htmlBody:
This video is amazing, the work of rationalist animations somehow keeps getting better and better. I love the way the video doesn't try and dumb things down, but instead explains a whole bunch of interconnect concepts in the best possible way with great audiovisual synergy.

Keep up the good work, I'm going to share this one quite widely (Like I did with my other favourites, counting pebbles and 500 million but not a single one more ;) )
